data.name: LICHEM
data.description: This package is an open-source (GPLv3) interface between QM and MM software so that QM/MM calculations can be performed with polarizable and frozen electron density force fields. Functionality is also present for standard point-charge based force fields, pure MM, and pure QM calculations.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Currently, the binary and user's manual are not included in the repository."
"LICHEM: Layered Interacting CHEmical Models" and "By: The Cisneros Research Group" plus "LICHEM is maintained by the Cisneros research group at the University of Texas at Dallas."

"This package is an open-source (GPLv3) interface between QM and MM software so that QM/MM calculations can be performed... Available calculations: single-point energies, geometry optimizations, classical Monte Carlo, path-integral Monte Carlo, and reaction pathways."
